title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, October 5, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss enumerates some items he has shipped home. He describes a brief skirmish, and a visit by Abraham Lincoln to the Federal forces at Harper's Ferry.
keywords: Home Front, Women, Slavery, African Americans, Battle Description, National Government, Death/Casualties, American Civil War
